```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# setup chunk options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>", 
  tidy = TRUE
)

# load packages
library(skimr)
library(DataExplorer)
library(naniar)
```

## Import data    

## Explore data
### explore variable types  
```{r include=FALSE}
iris %>% 
  skim() %>% 
  summary()
```

### explore missing data 
#### - plot missing value profile
```{r}
plot_missing(airquality)
```

#### - plot missingness
```{r}
vis_miss(airquality)
```

#### - plot the number of missings for each variable
```{r}
gg_miss_var(airquality)
gg_miss_which(airquality)
```
